title: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
OB: When entering invalid data on any preference page and the UI displays a red flag, if I try to select another page without fixing the problem, a warning dialog is shown with the message 'The currently displayed page contains invalid values'. However, this dialog should be an error dialog, as the user is not allowed to leave the page without fixing the mistake.
EB: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should display an error dialog instead of a warning.
SR: Display an error dialog instead of a warning when attempting to switch between erroneous preferences pages without fixing the invalid values.
